title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.22 - Crematory operator course facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.22 - Crematory operator course facilities

State Regulations

Each course shall be presented in such premises and in such
facilities as shall be necessary to properly present the course. Such
facilities shall be pre-approved by the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.22

Renumbered from 204.8

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
